articles.title: Special Report: As virus advances, doctors rethink rush to ventilate - Malaysiakini
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS | While initially doctors packed intensive care units with intubated patients, now many are exploring other options.
articles.content:

articles.title: Doctors Warn CCP Virus Might Cause Strokes in Young Adults - The Epoch Times
articles.description: Some doctors in New York have warned that COVID-19 might cause sudden strokes in adults in their 30s ...
articles.content:
Some doctors in New York have warned that COVID-19 might cause sudden strokes in adults in their 30s and 40s who aren’t otherwise seriously ill.
Those patients, doctors said in a new report this week, might not call the hospital or 911 because they have hear… [+2607 chars]
